Articles.Content: This has happened before a couple of times, and it's been happening quite recently. Whenever I'm building something I right click on it to adjust something and then my clicks have no effect. I have to spam buttons to get back control and I can't switch to any other programs when it happens. It's annoying as hell. What is this and why does it keep happening? The only mods I have are Kopernicus, OPM and Atomic Age.

I make a wild guess and declare your mouse as "maybe broken" via remote diagnosis.
Its very unlikely that its a software issue, check another mouse and batteries if cordless, check the receiver stick, plug / port whatever. Get well!
